citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The report to the Institutional Official was not approved by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee
(IACUC) and delivered in a timely manner. The fall 2022 IACUC semiannual inspection and program review were
conducted on 3 November, 2022. A majority of the IACUC did not approve the inspection, program review and report to
the Institutional Official (IO) until 24 May, 2023 the same day it was submitted to the IO. Reports to the IO shall be
updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required semi-annual evaluations and approval by the
IACUC.
Corrected during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Chair.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The report to the Institutional Official was not approved by a majority of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee 
(IACUC) and delivered in a timely manner.  The fall 2022 IACUC semiannual inspection and program review were 
conducted on 3 November, 2022.  A majority of the IACUC did not approve the inspection, program review and report to 
the Institutional Official (IO) until 24 May, 2023 the same day it was submitted to the IO.  Reports to the IO shall be 
updated at least once every six months upon completion of the required semi-annual evaluations and approval by the 
IACUC. 
 
Corrected during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the IACUC Chair. 
 
 n
